body_text:
This feels a bit like writing the same code twice as a test... but it tests the matching, and behavior over time, and the only other thing I can think of would be doing a fromJS over replacement initial state, which doesn't seem great.
I think this is just what feelings feel like. I'm with this.
body:
This feels a bit like writing the same code twice as a test... but it tests the matching, and behavior over time, and the only other thing I can think of would be doing a `fromJS` over replacement initial state, which doesn't seem great.

I think this is just what feelings feel like. I'm with this.
